member.name: T:NSwag.Commands.CodeGeneration.OperationGenerationMode
member.summary: Specifies how the operation name and client classes/interfaces are generated.

member.name: F:NSwag.Commands.CodeGeneration.OperationGenerationMode.MultipleClientsFromOperationId
member.summary: Multiple clients from the Swagger operation ID in the form '{controller}_{action}'.

member.name: F:NSwag.Commands.CodeGeneration.OperationGenerationMode.MultipleClientsFromPathSegments
member.summary: From path segments (operation name = last segment, client name = second to last segment).

member.name: F:NSwag.Commands.CodeGeneration.OperationGenerationMode.MultipleClientsFromFirstTagAndPathSegments
member.summary: From the first operation tag and path segments (operation name = last segment, client name = first operation tag).

member.name: F:NSwag.Commands.CodeGeneration.OperationGenerationMode.MultipleClientsFromFirstTagAndOperationId
member.summary: From the first operation tag and operation ID (operation name = operation ID, client name = first operation tag).

member.name: F:NSwag.Commands.CodeGeneration.OperationGenerationMode.SingleClientFromPathSegments
member.summary: From path segments suffixed by HTTP operation name
